title: Good to be Bad
Song description: This rebellious anthem explores the liberating feeling of breaking free from expectations. Sometimes embracing your darker side can lead to self-discovery and empowerment. The track blends moody melodies with raw lyrics about the freedom found in not always being 'good'.

title: Hope
Song description: A powerful ballad about resilience and finding light in darkness. 'Hope' combines uplifting melodies with heartfelt lyrics that speak to overcoming adversity. The track builds from a gentle piano intro to an inspiring crescendo, symbolizing the journey from struggle to triumph. The accompanying visuals feature a transformative character arc that mirrors the song's emotional progression.
